mapper.select: SELECT r.refund_id, r.pay_id, r.request_status, p.member_id as "buyer_member_id", p.pay_way, p.pay_money, p.pay_original_money, t.talent_title, t.member_id as "seller_member_id" FROM refund_request r INNER JOIN pay p ON r.pay_id= p.pay_id INNER JOIN talent_list t ON t.talent_id= p.talent_id WHERE r.request_status = '환불요청중'

SELECT r.refund_id, r.pay_id, r.request_status, p.member_id as "buyer_member_id", p.pay_way, p.pay_money, p.pay_original_money, t.talent_title, t.member_id as "seller_member_id" FROM refund_request r INNER JOIN pay p ON r.pay_id= p.pay_id INNER JOIN talent_list t ON t.talent_id= p.talent_id WHERE r.request_status = '환불완료'
mapper.update: UPDATE refund_request SET request_status = '환불완료' WHERE refund_id = #{refund_id} AND request_status = '환불요청중'
